duties_responsibilities.duty: Identify and secure new business opportunities as well as growth of existing customer accounts.
Selling staffing services to include contract, contract to hire, direct hire and payroll for various job titles.
Grow customer relationships through phone, email, and face to face meetings.
Identify and scope new job orders.
Present new job order details to the recruiting team.
Manage all or part of the job order process.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in Business Administration, Marketing, Communications, or related field.
